0010111111110110 1000010101110110 1 -> sum: 1011010101101101, cout: 0
0100011100100010 1000001101011100 0 -> sum: 1100101001111110, cout: 0
0000001011111111 0110001111000010 1 -> sum: 0110011011000010, cout: 0
0110100100001011 0011010101111011 1 -> sum: 1001111010000111, cout: 0
1001100000011000 1110100110100111 1 -> sum: 1000000111000000, cout: 1
0011100001000010 1001110001111100 0 -> sum: 1101010010111110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
